name: advenio
description:
info:

your parents were, along with half of your community, brutally murdered by marauding mercenaries who burned the remnants to the ground. you were able to survive that night, though a different fire was ignited in your belly.

having been assigned female at birth in a society that does not value you, you decide to take up a sword and a new name to find those that wronged you and yours, no matter what it takes.

revenge is wild justice, and you don’t want to be tamed.

features:

  • play as an afab mc (who can self-identify as female, non-binary or male, but who will often be referred to with he/him pronouns by strangers making assumptions) trying to navigate the world while posing as a knight fighting for justice.
  • develop relationships with male, female, and non-binary characters.
  • game and dev blog strictly 18+
